smile.validation

Class FMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.validation.FMeasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationMeasure

    public class FMeasure
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassificationMeasure
    The F-measure (also F1 score or F-score) considers both the precision p and the recall r of the test to compute the score. The F-measure is the harmonic mean of precision and recall,

    F-measure = 2 * precision * recall / (precision + recall)

    where an F-measure reaches its best value at 1 and worst score at 0.:

    Author:
    Haifeng Li
